sentence.Network_en: Her dress shows her pulchritude to advantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的裙子衬托出了她的美丽。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin pulchritudo, from pulcher, pulchr- 'beautiful'

auth_sentence.content: He makes a wordless noise appropriate to male approval of female pulchritude.

auth_sentence.content: It seems that endless varieties of pulchritude salivated to plunge into the kip with this virtuoso of the percales.
